description:
8.118 vibrato
Sinusoidal phase modulation.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: vibrato

parameters.description: Modulation frequency in Hertz. Range is 0.1 - 20000.0. Default value is 5.0 Hz.
parameters.name: f

parameters.description: Depth of modulation as a percentage. Range is 0.0 - 1.0. Default value is 0.5.
parameters.name: d

source:
8.118 vibrato

Sinusoidal phase modulation.

The filter accepts the following options:

f

Modulation frequency in Hertz. Range is 0.1 - 20000.0. Default value is 5.0 Hz.

d

Depth of modulation as a percentage. Range is 0.0 - 1.0. Default value is 0.5.
